event.title: contended with Prairie Ronde for the county seat, but the centrally-located village of Bronson (now

data.event: The village even contended with Prairie Ronde for the county seat, but the centrally-located village of Bronson (now Kalamazoo) was ultimately chosen.

event.title: the 1980s and 1990s, small employers such as Richard Allen Medical moved

data.event: In the 1980s and 1990s, small employers such as Richard Allen Medical moved to the edge of town, and Richland became a bedroom community for Kalamazoo.
